item.title: Louvain Modularity
item.description: Louvain Modularity # We optimize modularity based on the Louvian Partition Algorithm, which is: \[ \Delta M=\left[\frac{\sum_{in}+2k_{i,in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}+k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] - \left[\frac{\sum_{in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}}{2W}\right)^2 - \left(\frac{k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] \] Is used to make these networks Rank of words based on TF → 0 1 2 3 4 ↓ Community 0 theory game university new social 1 university anthropology american new study 2 psychology university work child new 3 social university sociology american work 4 university political american new science 5 economic economics university theory new 6 university economics economic research american 7 university work social new political 8 university economic research trade international 9 woman new research zealand economics 10 university gender society sylvia london 11 university religious religion sociology movement 12 – university oxford delhi new 13 university economics international economic trade 14 political election british university ’ 15 de religion paris et le 16 university international political state american 17 university organization management research social 18 ra philippine act coauthor president 19 der und frankfurt german die 20 german hitler germany war government 21 gender sexual child sex identity
